verses.verse: In the tenth <WH6224> year, <WH8141> in the tenth <WH6224> month, <WH8147> on the twelfth day of the month, <WH2320> the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,
"Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> set <WH7760> your face <WH6440> against Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> and prophesy <WH5012> against him and against all Egypt. <WH4714>

Speak <WH1696> and say, <WH559> <WH559> 'Thus says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> "Behold, <WH6547> I am against you, Pharaoh king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> the great <WH1419> monster <WH8577> that lies <WH7257> in the midst <WH8432> of his rivers, <WH2975> that has said, <WH559> <WH2975> 'My river is my own, <WH6213> and I have made it for myself.'

I will put <WH5414> hooks <WH2397> in your jaws, <WH3895> and I will make the fish <WH1710> of your rivers <WH2975> stick <WH1692> to your scales; <WH7193> and I will bring you up <WH5927> out of the midst <WH8432> of your rivers, <WH2975> with all the fish <WH1710> of your rivers <WH2975> which stick <WH1692> to your scales. <WH7193>

I <WH5203>'ll cast you forth into the wilderness, <WH4057> you and all the fish <WH1710> of your rivers. <WH2975> You <WH5307>'ll fall on the open <WH6440> field. <WH7704> You won't <WH622> be brought together, nor gathered. <WH6908> I have given <WH5414> you for food <WH402> to the animals <WH2416> of the earth <WH776> and to the birds <WH5775> of the sky. <WH8064>
All the inhabitants <WH3427> of Egypt <WH4714> will know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh, <WH3068> because they have been a staff <WH4938> of reed <WH7070> to the house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

When they took hold <WH8610> of you by your hand, <WH3709> you broke, <WH7533> and tore <WH1234> all their shoulders; <WH3802> and when they leaned <WH8172> on you, <WH7665> you broke, and paralyzed <WH5976> all of their thighs. <WH4975>"
Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> "Behold, <WH935> I will bring a sword <WH2719> on you, <WH3772> and will cut off man <WH120> and animal from you. <WH929>

The land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> shall be a desolation <WH8077> and a waste; <WH2723> and they shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh. <WH3068> Because he has said, <WH559> <WH2975> 'The river is mine, <WH6213> and I have made it;'

therefore, <WH2975> behold, I am against you, and against your rivers, and I will make <WH5414> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> an utter <WH2721> waste <WH2723> and desolation, <WH8077> from the tower <WH4024> of Seveneh <WH5482> even to the border <WH1366> of Ethiopia. <WH3568>

No foot <WH7272> of man <WH120> shall pass through <WH5674> it, <WH7272> nor foot of animal <WH929> shall pass through <WH5674> it, <WH3427> neither shall it be inhabited forty <WH705> years. <WH8141>

I will make <WH5414> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> a desolation <WH8077> in the midst <WH8432> of the countries <WH776> that are desolate; <WH8074> and her cities <WH5892> among <WH8432> the cities <WH5892> that are laid waste <WH2717> shall be a desolation <WH8077> forty <WH705> years; <WH8141> and I will scatter <WH6327> the Egyptians <WH4714> among the nations, <WH1471> and will disperse <WH2219> them through the countries. <WH776>"

For thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> "At the end <WH7093> of forty <WH705> years <WH8141> will I gather <WH6908> the Egyptians <WH4714> from the peoples <WH5971> where they were scattered; <WH6327>

and I will bring back <WH7725> the captivity <WH7622> of Egypt, <WH4714> and will cause them to return <WH7725> into the land <WH776> of Pathros, <WH6624> into the land <WH776> of their birth; <WH4351> and they shall be there a base <WH8217> kingdom. <WH4467>

It shall be the base <WH8217> of the kingdoms; <WH4467> neither shall it any more lift itself up above <WH5375> the nations: <WH1471> and I will diminish <WH4591> them, <WH7287> that they shall no more rule over the nations. <WH1471>

It shall be no more the confidence <WH4009> of the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> bringing <WH2142> iniquity <WH5771> to memory, <WH2142> when they turn to look <WH6437> after <WH310> them: <WH3045> and they shall know that I am the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>"'"

It came to pass in the seven <WH7651> and twentieth <WH6242> year, <WH8141> in the first <WH7223> month, <WH259> in the first day of the month, <WH2320> the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> caused <WH5647> his army <WH2428> to serve <WH5647> a great <WH1419> service <WH5656> against Tyre: <WH6865> every head <WH7218> was made bald, <WH7139> and every shoulder <WH3802> was worn; <WH4803> yet had he no wages, <WH7939> nor his army, <WH2428> from Tyre, <WH6865> for the service <WH5656> that he had served against it. <WH5647>

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> Behold, <WH5414> I will give the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> to Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon; <WH894> and he shall carry <WH5375> off her multitude, <WH1995> and take <WH5375> her spoil, <WH7998> and take <WH7997> her prey; <WH957> and it shall be the wages <WH7939> for his army. <WH2428>

I have given <WH5414> him the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> as his recompense <WH6468> for which he served, <WH5647> because they worked <WH6213> for me, <WH5002> says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>

In that day <WH3117> will I cause <WH6779> a horn <WH7161> to bud forth <WH6779> to the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> and I will give <WH5414> you the opening <WH6610> of the mouth <WH6310> in their midst; <WH8432> and they shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>
